visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type should be 'line'. The chart title should be 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The axes and labels should have specific styling: the title font size should be 18px, axis labels font size should be 14px, and the color for all labels and titles should be '#333333'. The data series should include one series named 'Rainfall' with the provided data. Custom colors should be used for the series, specifically '#008000'. Additional configurations should include a border around the chart, a plot border, and a left margin of 150 pixels. The chart should also have a tooltip that displays the series name and the point's category and value.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart with a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'line', and it includes a border and plot border with a left margin of 150 pixels. The x-axis categories represent the months from January to December, and the y-axis title is 'Rainfall (mm)'. Both axes have labels styled with a font size of 14px and a color of '#333333'. The chart title is styled with a font size of 18px and the same color. The data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with the given data points, and the series color is set to '#008000'. The tooltip displays the series name and the point's category and value when hovered over.
